tittle: New defination from WHO for long term COVID-19
description: The WHO now calls long COVID “post COVID-19 condition” and has outlined a variety of symptoms.

tittle: Are You Vaccinated?’ How to Ask Others Before Holiday Gatherings
description: WHO’s COVID-19 dashboard, updated daily, also features the number of vaccine doses administered globally, with more detail provided on the dedicated COVID-19 vaccination dashboard.

tittle: A state of feeling sad anger, anxiety, and depression
description: The depression therapies help you step back and identify what might be contributing to your depression, and further guides you in making necessary changes. But, each therapy has a different approach and different areas to tap on.
